item.title: Better Model Transfers Require Knowledge of Mechanisms
Outstanding challenges in the transferability of ecological models
item.description: Related materials Models transferred to novel conditions could provide predictions in data-poor scenarios, contributing to more informed management decisions, but outstanding challenges limit utility https://t.co/BHxqIheT59 @pjbouchet @KerrieMengersen @parnells @dmnhauntedworld @niwa_nz @G_OCeans pic.twitter.com/ACC0iaQskP — Katherine Yates (@Yates_KL) August 28, 2018
